dismissalText.commentary: Sachin Tendulkar b Enamul Haque 28 (21b 5x4 0x6 36m) SR: 133.33

notes: Match commenced sixty minutes after scheduled start, reduced to 47 overs a side. Bangladesh innings closed when rain returned after 43 overs.
India required 131 to win in 20 overs to qualify for the final on run rate.
India innings: 1x7 ball over (allowed by KT Francis for Sheikh Salahuddin in the 8th over of the innings).

milestones.description: Sheikh Salahuddin and Mafizur Rahman's 26-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 9th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 20 between Jahangir Shah and Nasir Ahmed
